trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of child controls in a table layout container.
trans-unit.target: 표 레이아웃 컨테이너에 자식 컨트롤의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class represents the collection of all the child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> 클래스의 모든 자식 컨트롤의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This collection is exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션에 의해 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can manage and individually manipulate members of the table layout panel through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> exposed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 관리 하 고 개별적으로 표 레이아웃 패널을 통해의 멤버를 조작할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> 에 의해 노출 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class is a minor specialization of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> 클래스는의 사소한 특수화는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> 기본 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control that contains the control collection.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 컬렉션이 들어 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Generally, the application programmer will not directly create instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 응용 프로그램 프로그래머는 직접 만들지의 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 기존에 대 한 참조 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection> 에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The control to add.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The column in which <c>control</c> will be placed.
trans-unit.target: <c>컨트롤</c>을 배치할 열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The row in which <c>control</c> will be placed.
trans-unit.target: <c>컨트롤</c>을 배치할 행입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified control to the collection and positions it at the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 컨트롤을 컬렉션에 추가하고 지정된 셀에 배치합니다.

trans-unit.source: With <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.Add%2A>, you can specify the cell position of `control`.
trans-unit.target: 와 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.Add%2A>, 셀 위치를 지정할 수 있습니다 `control`합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can assign `control` to a specific cell by providing both the `column` and `row` parameters, or you can specify only the column or row value and let the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> place `control` at the next open cell.
trans-unit.target: 할당할 수 있습니다 `control` 모두 제공 하 여 특정 셀에는 `column` 및 `row` 매개 변수 또는 있습니다 열 이나 행 값만 지정할 수 있으며 사용는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> 배치 `control` 열려 있는 다음 셀에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is known as letting the control *flow* to its position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 수 있도록로 알려져 *흐름* 에서 위치에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Set `column` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed row position.
trans-unit.target: 설정 `column` 하려는 경우-1로 `control` 고정된 행 위치에 배치 하려면.

trans-unit.source: Set `row` to -1 if you want `control` to occupy a fixed column position.
trans-unit.target: 설정 `row` 하려는 경우-1로 `control` 고정된 열 위치에 배치 하려면.

trans-unit.source: If neither `column` nor `row` is -1, `control` will be added at the absolute position given by (`column`, `row`).
trans-unit.target: 모두 `column` 나 `row` 은-1, `control` 에서 지정한 절대 위치에 추가 됩니다 (`column`, `row`).

trans-unit.source: If you set both `column` and `row` to -1, `control` will flow to the first open position, with the specific flow behavior defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 모두 설정 하면 `column` 및 `row` -1로 `control` 에 정의 된 특정 흐름 동작의 첫 번째 열기 위치로 전송 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 이을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: To get to the actual current position of a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 현재 실제 위치를 가져오려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 고려 전체 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 열 또는 행 범위를 포함 하 여 컨트롤 상태 및 시기는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 으로 컨트롤에 배치 된 해당 `Column` 및 `Row` 속성이-1로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="column" /> or <paramref name="row" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> 또는 <paramref name="row" />가 -1보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> that contains the controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 컨트롤이 들어 있는 부모 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> that contains the controls in the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 현재 컬렉션의 컨트롤이 들어 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection.%23ctor%2A> 생성자입니다.
